channel.title: ~ Oblivion 317 ~ 24-7 ~ Brand new ~ Loads of minigames ~ 20 Full Skills ~ OldSch
channel.description:
Hi Guys i have been lurking on Mopar for a while now, id like to take this opportunity to advertise my server project that i have worked on for long time.
Some people may not like my work or RsPs style but im not to fussed as im happy with what i have done here seeing as this is my third live rsps and i think this is by far the best...
So here it is;
[U][B]Developement Team[/B][/U] - Myself - Kush - Root Admin / Owner / Server Developer - Tyler - Java - Root Admin / Forum Developer / Graphics - Mike - Kiing - Admin / Developer - Dan - Super Saggy - Ingame/ forum Moderator / Beta tester - Tom - Jamydoger - Ingame / forum Moderator / Beta tester
[B][U]Server Spec[/U][/B]
- [url=http://www.project-oblivion.co.uk]Home[/url] - [URL=http://"http://project-oblivion.co.uk/index.php?action=play""]Webclient[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://project-oblivion.co.uk/Project-Oblivion.zip"]Download[/URL] - Base - Battlescape Cleaned [Now HIGHLY Edited] - Host - 60GB Dedicated Server 2GB Ram Unmetered Data transfer
[B][U]What i hope to achieve here[/U][/B]
- I hope to achieve my goal of running a renowned RSPS - To gain some friendly/Loyal/Sociable players. - Gain a good knowledge and understanding of meeting players needs. - Last longer than 6 months.. - LIVE LONG AND PROSPER
[B][U]Server Trates[/U][/B]
- 20 Fully functional skills with lots of training areas available - Full unique server navigation within the quest tab also Via NPC's - Last Man Standing - Epic Battle ~ Zombies ~ Clanwars ~ Barbarian Assault ~ Custom party room ~ - Duel arena with 100% Staking - All cape emotes - normal + Custom Emotes - Lots of Content - 6 level 1 clue scrolls 8 level 2 clue scrolls 10 level 3 clue scrolls - Im sure im forgetting loads (ill edit if i remember anymore)
[B][U]MEDIA[/U][/B]
6 Waves of relentless creatures [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert11.png[/img] Last man standing [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert13.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert12.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert14.png[/img] Perfect Dueling [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert15.png[/img] amazing Ancient Magiks [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert6.png[/img] working Barrows [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert8.png[/img] server navigation [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert3.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert4.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert5.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/dvert5.png[/img] Clan Chat from IX (credit to the IX Dev's) [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert9.png[/img] Working + Saving bank pin [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/advert2.png[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/fishing.png[/img] [IMG]http://https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/fletch.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/fletch1.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/mining.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/smithing.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96978471/smithing1.png[/img]
I only added some of the skills in screenies (IM LAZY !)
Thanks for taking the time to look at this server im sorry the media isnt amazing but alot of the content isnt appreciated until people try it hope you guys will have look..
Thanks
Kush
II ArC Kushz
We are currently looking for moderators and forum admin:D

item.title: ~ Oblivion 317 ~ 24-7 ~ Brand new ~ Loads of minigames ~ 20 Full Skills ~ OldSch
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Instead of having a “Waiting Room”, people should use an Interface which strings the Players currently listed as waiting in the que. Sure you would need to take a lot of measures to prevent abuse, but in the end, this is the superior way.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

Hi Guys i have been lurking on Mopar for a while now, id like to take this opportunity to advertise my server project that i have worked on for long time.

Some people may not like my work or RsPs style but im not to fussed as im happy with what i have done here seeing as this is my third live rsps and i think this is by far the best…

So here it is;

Developement Team

  • Myself - Kush - Root Admin / Owner / Server Developer
  • Tyler - Java - Root Admin / Forum Developer / Graphics
  • Mike - Kiing - Admin / Developer
  • Dan - Super Saggy - Ingame/ forum Moderator / Beta tester
  • Tom - Jamydoger - Ingame / forum Moderator / Beta tester

Server Spec

  • Home
  • Webclient
  • Download
  • Base - Battlescape Cleaned [Now HIGHLY Edited]
  • Host - 60GB Dedicated Server 2GB Ram Unmetered Data transfer

What i hope to achieve here

  • I hope to achieve my goal of running a renowned RSPS
  • To gain some friendly/Loyal/Sociable players.
  • Gain a good knowledge and understanding of meeting players needs.
  • Last longer than 6 months…
  • LIVE LONG AND PROSPER

Server Trates

  • 20 Fully functional skills with lots of training areas available
  • Full unique server navigation within the quest tab also Via NPC’s
  • Last Man Standing - Epic Battle ~ Zombies ~ Clanwars ~ Barbarian Assault ~ Custom party room ~
  • Duel arena with 100% Staking
  • All cape emotes
  • normal + Custom Emotes
  • Lots of Content
  • 6 level 1 clue scrolls 8 level 2 clue scrolls 10 level 3 clue scrolls
  • Im sure im forgetting loads (ill edit if i remember anymore)

MEDIA

6 Waves of relentless creatures

Last man standing



Perfect Dueling

amazing Ancient Magiks

working Barrows

server navigation




Clan Chat from IX (credit to the IX Dev’s)

I only added some of the skills in screenies (IM LAZY !)

Thanks for taking the time to look at this server im sorry the media isnt amazing but alot of the content isnt appreciated until people try it hope you guys will have look…

Thanks

Kush
